## ISRAT Cod Detector

Cod grunt detector developed by Ildar Uzguralihiev and Annamaria DeAngelis

* Makara detector code: MATLAB\_COD\_ISRAT  
* [Cod Detector Protocol](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gvj1Ejn7NL6Bu1mg95fzNNtnZmpPq6ny/edit)  
* Gateway Cod Detector Protocol: \\\\nefscdata\\PassiveAcoustics\\PAB\_ANALYSIS\_TRAINING\\SOUND\_ECOLOGY\\NEFSC\_Fish\_Analysis Training\\Cod

## Haddock Convolutional Neural Network Detector

Haddock CNN detector developed by Xavier Muoy

* Makara detector code: PYTHON\_HADDOCK\_CNN  
* Link to analysis protocol page (unavailable, still in experimental phase)

## Haddock Kurtosis Detector

Kurtosis detector for haddock developed by Xavier Muoy

* Makara detector code: PYTHON\_HADDOCK\_KURTOSIS  
* [Protocol](/content/Analysis/Protocols/haddock_Kurtosis.pdf)

## FishSound Finder Detector

CNN for general identification of unidentified fish sounds

* Makara detector code: PYTHON\_MULTI-SPECIES\_FISH  
* [FishSound Github](https://github.com/xaviermouy/FishSound_Finder) - Xavier Mouy
* [FishSound web page](https://fishsound-finder.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)
